MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY6, KY7 and KY15 postcode areas of Cupar. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00AM due to repairs required to a section of our overhead line network following lightning strikes. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.23AM on 07 November 2020.
